message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I know it's worth a lot to you, and I'm confident we can find a price that works for both of us.  My initial offer is $1000000.  Let's see if we can work something out.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $850000 is a step in the right direction, it's still quite a bit lower than what I need to make this deal worthwhile. How about we split the difference?  I'm willing to come down to $925000. This would give us both a good deal and allow us to move forward.
I understand where you're coming from, Alice, but $925000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $900000. I think this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence and your willingness to come up on your offer. However, $900000 still doesn't quite meet my needs. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $950000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of this product and allows us to both walk away feeling satisfied.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Alice, but $950000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to make one more offer: $920000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your final offer and your willingness to negotiate. While $920000 is closer to what I'm looking for, it's still a little lower than what I need to make this deal worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time and offer $935000. This is my final offer, and I believe it's a fair price that reflects the value of this product. I'm confident we can both walk away happy with this agreement.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Alice, but $935000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to make one more offer: $915000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
